useCase.name: Add and Register New Vehicle

preconditions.precondition: The administrator is logged in the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The new vehicle is successfully added and registered in the system.

useCase.trigger: An administrator intends to add and register a new vehicle.

mainSequence.step: Administrator creates a new Agencia named agenciaVehiculos.
Administrator creates a new Furgoneta named furgoneta with patente and pma.
Administrator creates a new Vehiculo for furgoneta with patente.
Administrator creates a new Blindado named blindaje.
Administrator creates a new Premium category.
Administrator creates a new Coche named coche with patente, plazas, categoria, blindaje.
Administrator registers the vehicle (coche) in the agency.
The agency adds the vehicle (coche) to the list of vehicles.
